Description.Name: Rager Medium Buckshot Ammo 1x
Description.Details:
Ammo Bins contain the rounds needed for projectile-based weaponry, with at least one bin required per weapon type. Ammo Bins will explode and destroy their installed location when they receive a Critical Hit.

Rager Medium 1x Ammo Bins each contain 200 buckshot pellet projectiles and may feed multiple weapons.  This allows a Rager buckshot cannon that uses this ammunition to be fired 20 times per ammunition box of this type.
